description.name: Spray gun LVLP 2.0mm
description.long_desc:
Professional spray gun LVLP. Manufactured from the best quality materials. The gun is powered by compressed air. The air from the compressor reaches the paint tank and the gun tip. The resulting pressure "pushes" the liquid out of the tank, and the atomized paint particles are thrown through the nozzle onto the painted surface.


The LVLP (Low Volume Low Pressure) technology allows for a large volume of ejected paint with low air pressure pushing the paint through the nozzle. As a result, less paint is wasted with the exhaust air at the same time more falls on the painted surface, which reduces paint consumption. Particularly recommended for high-viscosity paints.


The paint adjustment knob located on the side of the body regulates the size of the paint flow.


The material adjustment knob allows you to adjust the amount of paint flowing out of the nozzle.


The pressure control knob allows you to regulate the pressure of the air coming to the gun from the compressor.


Product features:



  • LVLP technology

  • 600 ml plastic tank with 100 ml graduations

  • solid and tight construction

  • adjustment of the flow and amount of paint

  • air pressure adjustment

  • additional adjustment of the paint stream using the nozzle

  • ergonomic and profiled handle

  • lightweight aluminum body

  • brass air cap with a 2.0mm diameter stainless steel needle and nozzle

  • 1/4" quick coupler


Technical data:



  • Gun type: LVLP

  • Paint-applying method: gravitational

  • Nozzle diameter: 2.0mm

  • Stream width: 280 - 310 mm

  • Paint tank capacity: 600 ml

  • Recommended working pressure: 2.0 - 3.0 bar

  • Airflow: 170 liters/min

  • Connection: 1/4" quick coupler

  • Material: nozzle and needle made of stainless steel; brass nozzle

  • Application: rare paints and stains


The set includes:



  • HVLP spray gun

  • 600 ml paint tank

  • nozzle wrench

  • spare filter

  • cleaning brush

description.name: Wrench for ring tie wire 300mm
description.long_desc:
Automatic wrench for tying reinforcing wires. The special design of the wrench greatly facilitates and speeds up reinforcement works. A firm pull on the handle results in a three-fold rotation of the hook, and thus the twisting of the reinforcing wire.


Product features:



  • high quality

  • ergonomic handle ensures a secure grip of the tool

  • significantly facilitates and speeds up the performance of reinforcement works

  • a certain pull on the handle results in a three-fold rotation of the hook

  • 30 cm long wrench

  • the use of the wrench is much less straining on the wrist
description.short_desc:

description.name: Felt pads 20x20mm 20pcs
description.long_desc:
Self-adhesive felt pads are intended for gluing the legs of furniture, tables, chairs, etc. in order to protect the floor against scratching. They are also perfect as an element damping the sound of slamming cabinets.


Product features:



  • made of thick, high-quality black felt

  • self-adhesive

  • protect the floor against scratching

  • perfectly suppress the sound of slamming cabinets


Kit Contents:



  • felt pads 20x20 mm - 20 pcs

description.name: Silicone droplets washers under furniture 10mm 25pcs
description.long_desc:
Self-adhesive silicone stops are perfect for protecting a wall against damage by a furniture handle. They perfectly muffle the sound of slamming cabinets, they can also be used as anti-skid feet.


Product characteristics:



  • self-adhesive, perfectly protect the wall and furniture fronts against damage

  • muffle the sound of slamming cabinets

  • They will also work well as anti-skid feet

  • the transparent color makes the stops practically invisible

  • the set includes 25 stops with a diameter of 10 mm

description.name: Try square 300mm (12/120)
description.long_desc:
Try square with a working length of 300mm. Made of high-quality aluminum and steel. A steel strip with a two-sided metric scale. The try square is especially useful in the carpentry and construction industry when determining and checking right angles.


Product Features:



  • foot made of durable aluminum

  • steel strip with a two-sided metric scale

  • total length of the try square: 305mm

  • inner working length: 260mm

  • outer working length: 300mm
description.short_desc:
Try square with a working length of 300mm. Made of high-quality aluminum and steel. A steel strip with a two-sided metric scale. The try square is especially useful in the carpentry and construction industry when determining and checking right angles.

  • foot made of durable aluminum

  • steel strip with a two-sided metric scale

  • total length of the try square: 305mm

  • inner working length: 260mm

  • outer working length: 300mm

description.name: Sprayer 1L
description.long_desc:
Manual pressure sprayer with 1L capacity.


The sprayer is a highly effective tool for plant protection. It can be used to prevent plant diseases and remove pests on large plantations and cultivated fields of cereals, gardens, flowers, fruit and tea trees, etc. It is ideal for protection and care works.


Product features:



  • trigger with locking button 

  • durable polyethylene tank

  • very light

  • 1 liter capacity

description.name: Crowbar for pulling nails 800x18mm
description.long_desc:
Crowbar 800mm / 31 x 26 mm


Crowbar, manufatured from steel, makes crushing hard materials easier. Irreplaceable during renovation works such as removing skirting boards, floors, panelling. Allows you to easily remove nails from boards, etc. thanks to the special tip bent at an angle of 100 °.


Product features:
total length: 800mm
the larger end of the crowbar bent at an angle of 100°
made of steel rod with a diameter of 18mm
width of ends  31 and 26 mm
enables to remove nails

description.name: AUTOMATIC POINT TO MARK METAL 125mm
description.long_desc:
Automatic punch 125mm made of tool steel, designed to punch small holes in metal, which greatly facilitate e.g. precise drilling. The special design of the punch eliminates the need to use a hammer. Automatic marking takes place thanks to a strong internal spring that moves the needle.


Product features:



  • Automatic type punch, marking is done without the use of a hammer

  • it has a strong internal spring that moves the needle

  • compared to classic punches, the automatic punch is operated with one hand

  • made of high-quality tool steel

  • designed for punching metal (punching small holes)

  • extremely useful for precise drilling
description.short_desc:
Automatic punch 125mm made of tool steel, designed to punch small holes in metal, which greatly facilitate e.g. precise drilling. The special design of the punch eliminates the need to use a hammer. Automatic marking takes place thanks to a strong internal spring that moves the needle.

  • compared to classic punches, the automatic punch is operated with one hand

  • extremely useful for precise drilling

description.name: AUTOMATIC POINT TO METAL 125mm
description.long_desc:
Automatic punch 125mm with adjustment made of tool steel, designed for punching small holes in metal, which greatly facilitate, for example, precise drilling. The special design of the punch eliminates the need to use a hammer. Automatic marking takes place thanks to a strong internal spring that moves the needle.


Product features:



  • Automatic type punch, marking is done without the use of a hammer

  • it has a strong internal spring that moves the needle

  • the ability to regulate the impact force of the needle depending on the currently marked material

  • compared to classic punches, the automatic punch is operated with one hand

  • made of high-quality tool steel

  • designed for punching metal (punching small holes)

  • extremely useful for precise drilling

description.name: Contour gauge 25cm
description.long_desc:
Contour gauge for mapping shapes. Particularly useful when performing various types of renovation, finishing, and tiling works. It is used for mapping irregular shapes, e.g. when cutting tiles in places where hydraulic pipes go.


Product Features:



  • the device is irreplaceable during all kinds of construction and renovation works

  • can also be used in tiling, carpentry, tinsmithing, locksmithing, etc.

  • perfect reproduction of irregular shapes thanks to the use of 1mm thick leaves

  • one side of the template has a metric scale from 0 to 25 cm

  • the other side has an imperial measure ranging from 0 to 10 inches

  • made of durable plastic
description.short_desc:
Contour gauge for mapping shapes. Particularly useful when performing various types of renovation, finishing, and tiling works. It is used for mapping irregular shapes, e.g. when cutting tiles in places where hydraulic pipes go.


Product Features:



  • the device is irreplaceable during all kinds of construction and renovation works

  • can also be used in tiling, carpentry, tinsmithing, locksmithing, etc.

  • perfect reproduction of irregular shapes thanks to the use of 1mm thick leaves

  • one side of the template has a metric scale from 0 to 25 cm

  • the other side has an imperial measure ranging from 0 to 10 inches

  • made of durable plastic

description.name: Glue uns 11,2x300mm 1kg
description.long_desc:
Klej do pistoletu na gorco 11x300mm 1kg.

Klej termotopliwy 11x300mm, bezzapachowy, przeroczysty, niebrudzcy o duej gitkoci.
Przeznaczony do pistoletw obsugujcych kleje o rednicy 11-12 mm.
Klej wykonany na bazie polimeru doskonale klei si do rnego rodzaju materiaw.

Cechy produktu:

  • nie brudzi
  • nie zapycha pistoletw
  • doskonay do wszelkiego rodzaju prac rcznych
  • doskonale klei rnego rodzaju materiay

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Dugo: 300 mm
  • rednica: 11 mm
  • Waga: 1 kg

description.name: Masonry chisel 215x100mm
description.long_desc:
Masonry chisel with a grip protecting the hand against impact. Manufactured from CrV tool steel with a 26mm hexagonal section and a working width of 100mm. It has an ergonomic, two-component handle that ensures a secure grip of the tool. Designed for chiselling, breaking and crushing hard construction materials such as bricks, concrete blocks, etc.


Product features:
made of CrV tool steel
two-component, ergonomic handle with an integrated shield protecting the hand against impact
hexagonal section 26mm


Technical Specifications:


Material: CrV tool steel


Total length: 215mm


Section: hexagonal 26mm


Width of the working part: 100mm


Handle: ergonomic, two-component

description.name: NEGATIVE CLAMP 500A
description.long_desc: Klema ujemna / wycznik masy akumulatora. Doskonale sprawdzi si jako zabezpieczenie akumulatora przed rozadowaniem, wystarczy lekko wykrci zielone pokrto i akumulator zostanie rozczony. Stosujc wycznik masy nie bdziesz musia za kadym razem odkrca klemy akumulatora. Uniwersalne zastosowanie, moe by stosowany we wszystkich samochodach, jachtach, kamperach itp.

description.name: Punch 6x10x100mm
description.long_desc:
A 6x10x100 punch made of tool steel, designed to punch small indentations in metal, which make precise drilling easier. 


Product features:
made of high quality tool steel
designed for punching metal (punching small indentations)
extremely useful for precise drilling
designed to be used with a hammer
punch dimensions 6x10x100

description.name: Spring clamp 100mm
description.long_desc:
100mm spring clamp made of durable plastic, equipped with a strong steel spring and swinging jaws adapting to the pressed surface. Perfect for e.g. gluing various types of elements.


Product features:



  • made of high-quality plastic

  • equipped with a solid compression spring and swinging jaws

  • size: 100mm

  • clamp type: spring

description.name: Felt pads 28pcs round 25mm square 40mm(white)
description.long_desc:
Self-adhesive felt pads are intended for gluing the legs of furniture, tables, chairs, etc. in order to protect the floor against scratching, they are also perfect as an element damping the sound of slamming cabinets.


Product Features:



  • made of thick, high-quality white felt

  • self-adhesive

  • protect the floor against scratching

  • perfectly suppress the sound of slamming cabinets


Kit Contents:



  • felt pads 25x25 mm - 12 pcs.

  • felt pads 40x40 mm - 4 pcs.

  • felt pads round 25 mm - 12 pcs.

description.name: Ring tie wire 1000pcs. dia1.6mm 14cm
description.long_desc: Double loop tie wire 1.6 mm thick and  14 cm long, for binding reinforcement, fencing mesh. Two ends of the wire ended with an eye adapted to special spanners for tying reinforcements. The set includes 1000 pcs of binding wires.
description.short_desc: Double loop tie wire 1.6 mm thick and  14 cm long, for binding reinforcement, fencing mesh. Two ends of the wire ended with an eye adapted to special spanners for tying reinforcements. The set includes 1000 pcs of binding wires.
description.description: Double loop tie wire 1.6 mm thick and  14 cm long, for binding reinforcement, fencing mesh. Two ends of the wire ended with an eye adapted to special spanners for tying reinforcements. The set includes 1000 pcs of binding wires.

description.name: Silicone droplets washers under furniture 8mm 50pcs
description.long_desc:
Self-adhesive silicone stops are perfect for protecting a wall against damage by a furniture handle. They perfectly muffle the sound of slamming cabinets, they can also be used as anti-skid feet.


Product characteristics:



  • self-adhesive, perfectly protect the wall and furniture fronts against damage

  • muffle the sound of slamming cabinets

  • They will also work well as anti-skid feet

  • the transparent color makes the stops practically invisible

  • the set includes 50 stops with a diameter of 8 mm
description.short_desc:
Self-adhesive silicone stops are perfect for protecting a wall against damage by a furniture handle. They perfectly muffle the sound of slamming cabinets, they can also be used as anti-skid feet.

  • They will also work well as anti-skid feet

description.name: Manual brass sprayer for bottle
description.long_desc:
Mosiny opryskiwacz cininiowy nakrcany na butelk. Niezwykle przydatne narzdzie w kadym ogrodzie.

Idealnie sprawdza si w pracach ochronnych i pielgnacyjnych. Moe by stosowany w zapobieganiu chorb rolin i usuwania szkodnikw na duych plantacjach i polach uprawnych zb, ogrodw, kwiatw, drzewek owocowych i herbacianych, itd.

Wykonany z wysokiej jakoci tworzywa sztucznego, wyposaony standardowy gwint.

Przystosowany jest do stosowania z butelkami o pojemnoci do 1 litra z najpopularniejszym rozmiarem gwintu wystpujcym w wikszoci butelek po wodzie mineralnej oraz popularnych napojach gazowanych.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • w zestawie z opryskiwaczem jest gumowa rurka oraz zestaw uszczelek
  • mosina dysza z moliwoci regulacji strumienia
  • cakowita dugo to ok 350mm
  • przeznaczony do efektywnego nawadniania rolin oraz czyszczenia zanieczyszcze
description.short_desc:
Mosiny opryskiwacz cininiowy nakrcany na butelk. Niezwykle przydatne narzdzie w kadym ogrodzie.

Idealnie sprawdza si w pracach ochronnych i pielgnacyjnych. Moe by stosowany w zapobieganiu chorb rolin i usuwania szkodnikw na duych plantacjach i polach uprawnych zb, ogrodw, kwiatw, drzewek owocowych i herbacianych, itd.

Wykonany z wysokiej jakoci tworzywa sztucznego, wyposaony standardowy gwint.

Przystosowany jest do stosowania z butelkami o pojemnoci do 1 litra z najpopularniejszym rozmiarem gwintu wystpujcym w wikszoci butelek po wodzie mineralnej oraz popularnych napojach gazowanych.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • w zestawie z opryskiwaczem jest gumowa rurka oraz zestaw uszczelek
  • mosina dysza z moliwoci regulacji strumienia
  • cakowita dugo to ok 350mm
  • przeznaczony do efektywnego nawadniania rolin oraz czyszczenia zanieczyszcze
description.description:
Mosiny opryskiwacz cininiowy nakrcany na butelk. Niezwykle przydatne narzdzie w kadym ogrodzie.

Idealnie sprawdza si w pracach ochronnych i pielgnacyjnych. Moe by stosowany w zapobieganiu chorb rolin i usuwania szkodnikw na duych plantacjach i polach uprawnych zb, ogrodw, kwiatw, drzewek owocowych i herbacianych, itd.

Wykonany z wysokiej jakoci tworzywa sztucznego, wyposaony standardowy gwint.

Przystosowany jest do stosowania z butelkami o pojemnoci do 1 litra z najpopularniejszym rozmiarem gwintu wystpujcym w wikszoci butelek po wodzie mineralnej oraz popularnych napojach gazowanych.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • w zestawie z opryskiwaczem jest gumowa rurka oraz zestaw uszczelek
  • mosina dysza z moliwoci regulacji strumienia
  • cakowita dugo to ok 350mm
  • przeznaczony do efektywnego nawadniania rolin oraz czyszczenia zanieczyszcze

description.name: Utility knife 100x18x0.5mm SK5 (black blade)
description.long_desc:
Wallpaper knife plastic rubberized breakaway blade black 18mm SK5


A universal knife equipped with an 18mm broken blade made of SK5 steel, additionally covered with a black anti-corrosion coating.


The knife is made of plastic, the profiled handle is covered with non-slip rubber.


Product Features:



  • metal blade guide

  • sliding, broken SK5 steel blade

  • contoured, non-slip handle


Technical Data:



  • Application: for cutting wallpapers, cardboard, tapes, cables, carpets

  • Blade width: 18 mm

  • Blade material: SK5 carbon steel with anti-corrosion coating

  • Additional information: broken blade

description.name: Blades for utility knifes 100x18x0.5mm SK5 (black blade) 10szt.
description.long_desc:
Breakaway replacement blades 18mm 10pcs made of high-quality SK5 carbon steel, known for their high resistance to cracks and chipping. Thanks to the good abrasion resistance, the blades do not dull quickly. SK-5 carbon steel is rust-proof steel, therefore it has been protected with a black anti-corrosion coating.


Product features:



  • 10 blades 100x18x0.5mm made of SK5 carbon steel

  • blades with a black anti-corrosion coating

  • notches to facilitate breaking the blades
description.short_desc:

description.name: Oil dispenser - 8L pneumatic filler
description.long_desc:
8L pneumatic dispenser intended for the pneumatic oil filling.


Perfect for oil filling: engines, gearboxes (including automatic ones), driving axles, mowers, and other hard-to-reach places.


Product features:



  • equipped with a readable pressure gauge with regulation

  • 1.5 m long cable and a flexible tip, which can be freely bent, will allow you to reach hard-to-reach places

  • dispenser refill indicator with 1-8 liter scale

  • device especially useful in professional car workshops


Technical Specifications:



  • Power supply: pneumatic

  • Capacity: 8 liters

  • Working temperature: from -4 ° C to 90 ° C

  • Maximum working pressure: 1.5 kPa

  • Purpose: engine oil, gear oil, ATF / brake oil, etc.

  • Oil line length: 1.5 m
